text: Experimental Marriage is a 1919 American silent romantic comedy film directed by Robert G. Vignola and starring Constance Talmadge, Harrison Ford, and Walter Hiers.Langman p. 367. == Cast == * Constance Talmadge as Suzanne Ercoll * Harrison Ford as Foxcroft Grey * Walter Hiers as Charlie Hamilton * Vera Sisson as Do Harrington * Edythe Chapman as Mrs. Ercoll * Raymond Hatton as Arthur Barnard * Mayme Kelso as Mrs. Entwhisle * James Gordon as Callahan == References == == Bibliography == * Langman, Larry. American Film Cycles: The Silent Era. Greenwood Publishing, 1998. == External links == * * Category:1919 films Category:1919 romantic comedy films Category:American films Category:American romantic comedy films Category:Films directed by Robert G. Vignola Category:American silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:Selznick Pictures films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1919 comedy films
title: Experimental Marriage
